/a.js(16,9): error TS18004: No value exists in scope for the shorthand property 'arguments'. Either declare one or provide an initializer.

    const a = () => {
        return {
            arguments: [],
        };
    };
    
    const b = () => {
        const c = {
            arguments: [],
        }
        return c;
    };

        return {
            arguments,

        const arguments = undefined;
